name: Planet Savior
description:
Planet Savior
Planet saviour is an arcade game created for the 2019 Summer Unreal Jam.
Theme “Make it count”
Team: PewPewGames

Members:
*Apolejo (Alejandro Apolinar-Apolejo1206@hotmail.com)
*DontTryThisAtLoL(Christopher Islas-ryzejunglegg@hotmail.com)

How to play:

Esc or P- to pause the game

1,2,3 and 4 to use spells, You can also click spells button 

Hold left mouse click to do single target damage

Left mouse click to place the spells

Hold right mouse click to rotate around the world.

You only have 40 spells, MAKE IT COUNT!

All the content was made inside the Unreal Summer Gamejam deadline

If you’re interested in supporting us, you can donate us<3
